title.rendered: Top 10 Recommended Courses for CSE Students!

content.rendered:
Explore the details of the top 10 recommended courses tailored for computer science students and recent graduates!

Google offers a range of free online certification courses that can help enhance your skills in various fields, such as digital marketing, IT support, data analysis, and more. Here are 10 of the top free online certification courses provided by Google:

1. Google IT Support Professional Certificate

  • Duration: Approximately 6 months
  • Overview: This program prepares you for entry-level IT support roles. You’ll learn about troubleshooting, customer service, networking, system administration, and security.

Click here to register for this course now!

2. Google Analytics for Beginners

  • Duration: Approximately 4 hours
  • Overview: Learn the basics of Google Analytics, including how to set up and analyze reports, track visitors, and measure digital campaigns.

Click here to register for this course now!

3. Google Digital Garage: Fundamentals of Digital Marketing

  • Duration: 40 hours
  • Overview: A comprehensive course covering digital marketing basics like search engine optimization (SEO), content marketing, social media, and Google Ads.

Click here to register for this course now!

4. Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate

  • Duration: Approximately 6 months
  • Overview: Gain practical skills in data analysis, including using tools like spreadsheets, SQL, and R to analyze data and solve business problems.

Click here to register for this course now!

5. Google Cloud Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure

  • Duration: 1-2 hours
  • Overview: Learn the basics of Google Cloud Platform, including key services like computing, storage, and networking. Ideal for those new to cloud technology.

Click here to register for this course now!

6. Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Big Data and Machine Learning

    • Duration: 1-2 hours
    • Overview: This course introduces the core services in Google Cloud for big data and machine learning, which is perfect for anyone looking to explore the data science field.

    Click here to register for this course now!

    7. Google Ads Search Certification

    • Duration: Approximately 4-6 hours
    • Overview: Learn how to create and manage Google Ads campaigns for search engines and understand campaign optimization and reporting.

    Click here to register for this course now!

    8. Google Ads Display Certification

    • Duration: Approximately 4-6 hours
    • Overview: This course covers creating effective display ad campaigns using Google Ads to reach potential customers across the web.

    Click her to register for this course now!

    9. Google Ads Video Certification

    • Duration: Approximately 4-6 hours
    • Overview: Learn how to create and manage video campaigns on YouTube using Google Ads. The course covers best practices for video advertising.

    Click here to register for this course now!

    10. Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer Certification

    • Duration: Self-paced (study materials and practice exams included)
    • Overview: For those with experience in data engineering, this certification helps you develop expertise in building and optimizing data processing systems on Google Cloud.

    Click here to register for this course now!

    These courses effectively develop skills in IT, data analysis, digital marketing, and cloud technologies, and many are self-paced for added convenience.

    For more updates on recommended courses for CSE students, stay tuned with CSE NoticeBard!
